title: `Router.push` with `basePath` Results in `basePath` being Repeated Twice
body:
### Link to the code that reproduces this issue

https://github.com/Dan6erbond/revline/blob/a608ed5646019682456d65a42bd4abc3562d224e/client/src/components/performance/drag-sessions/create.tsx#L48

### To Reproduce

1. Set a `BASE_PATH` in `.env` like `/app`
2. Build and run the app
3. Create a car & drag session

### Current vs. Expected behavior

The app will redirect to `/app/app/cars/...` instead of `/app/cars/...`

### Provide environment information
